title: Changing Between Main Navigation Tabs (Lite User)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
and the user is not logged in with a paid account
(test for Lite and Single Team users)
custom_steps:
When the user launches the app
and is left on their landing page

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on another tab from the slide out menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see an ad interstitial served by DFP

custom_steps_separated.content:
on 7 inch tablets
in Portrait mode

on 7 inch tablets
in Landscape mode

on tablets larger than 7 inches
in Portrait mode

on tablets larger than 7 inches
in Landscape mode
When the user continues to switch tabs
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then they should not see any more ad interstitials

title: Changing Between Main Navigation Tabs (Paid User)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
and the user is logged in with a paid account
(At Bat Premium; TV Premium; Single Team+At Bat)
custom_steps:
When the user launches the app
and is left on their landing page

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on another tab from the slide out menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will NOT see an ad interstitial

title: Interstitial Blackout
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
and the user is not logged in with a paid account
custom_steps: When the user launches At Bat

title: Limit with Gameday Interstitial
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
and the user is a LITE or Single Team user
custom_steps: When the user launches the app

custom_steps_separated.content:
If the user sees an app entry interstitial
and then enters Gameday (for the first time in 12 hours)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should NOT see a Gameday entry interstitial
(User should see only one of the two entry ads per user session)

custom_steps_separated.content:
If the user does NOT see an app entry interstitial
and then enters Gameday (for the first time in 12 hours)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should see a Gameday entry interstitial
(User should see only one of the two entry ads per user session)

title: Exceptions
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
and the user is a LITE or Single Team user
custom_steps: When the user enters At Bat via a deep link

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should NOT see an app entry interstitial

custom_steps_separated.content: via a Google app indexing deep link
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should NOT see an app entry interstitial
